content: I apologize again for the error in my previous response. I seem to have mixed up my information on natural wine producers in Spain. Fernando Garcia Berry is indeed the co-founder and winemaker of Comando G, which is highly regarded for its minimal intervention winemaking techniques in the Sierra de Gredos region of Spain. Otros Vinos, on the other hand, is a natural wine distributor based in Madrid that works with a variety of Spanish and international natural wine producers.
